Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Splendidly \Splen"did*ly\, adv. In a splendid manner; magnificently. [1913 Webster]

splendidly adv 1: in a splendid manner; "he did splendidly in the exam"; "we got along famously" [syn: {magnificently}, {famously}] 2: in an impressively beautiful manner; "the Princess was gorgeously dressed" [syn: {gorgeously}, {resplendently}, {magnificently}]
